item.title: Dropbox Shuts Down Carousel And Mailbox - WebProNews
item.description:
Dropbox Shuts Down Carousel And Mailbox - WebProNews

Dropbox announced on Monday that it is shutting down its Carousel and Mailbox products on March 31st and February 26th respectively. From the sound of it, key features and ideas from these products will be utilized in the Dropbox app.
